item.description:
Hey y'all! Calling all liberty people for this rad event!! I have been wanting to plan a fun event and then Sky informed me her sister Kathy will be performing at Firefly's next Friday so lets combine the two. A great chance to converse with liberty minded folk while chowing on good southern bbq and listening to incredible music!!

This is also an opportunity to support the sister of one of our favorite liberty gals who has done so much for us. Please check out the link for more info about Kathy's performance:

http://campaign.r20.constantcontact.com/render?llr=xpmtzkcab&v=001AwKjSTzc574sARrBhmbU4K3JIl58O2yv3_HnXMijSHHpWahY0LBrFsqwWbINM5s9r_EcnAIqk54b0kkr248iwYTwbQWYNcoDnPUtiorxsfI%3D
item.name: Barbeque & Music with the Liberty Peeps!
